newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Applix cut to neutral.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Applix cut to neutral.

text.p: -- First Albany Corp said on Tuesday analyst Damian Rinaldi had reduced his rating for Applix Inc to neutral from buy.
-- Rinaldi said in a report that he had cut the rating because of Applix's preliminary announcement that it would have a revenue shortfall in the first quarter of 1997.
-- "We expect the company to record a loss in the $0.03-$0.05 per share range for the quarter as a result, compared to a gain of $0.19 in our previous estimate."
-- He preliminarily reduced his estimate of 1997 earnings per share to $0.04 from $0.92 and to $0.41 from $1.30 for 1998.
-- Shares in the Westboro, Mass., software company closed on Monday at 6-1/4.
